content.text: I'm doing well, thank you for asking! How are you today?
I'm doing well, thank you! I'm just relaxing at home today.
That's good to hear! I'm also just relaxing at home today. I'm not too interested in social media, I'd rather be focusing on my yoga and finding a partner to spend my life with.
That's great! I'm not too interested in social media either. I like to focus on my hobbies, like swimming and reading.
I love swimming! I used to swim competitively when I was younger.
Really? That's awesome! I wish I could swim competitively, but I have asthma.
That's too bad. Asthma can be a real pain.
Yeah, it can be. But I'm learning to live with it.
Thanks! So, what are your hobbies?
I like yoga, reading, and collecting vintage toys.
Vintage toys? That's interesting! What kind of vintage toys do you collect?
I collect a lot of different kinds of toys, but my favorite are Star Wars toys.
I love Star Wars! I have a few Star Wars toys myself.
That's awesome! We should compare collections sometime.
Great! I'll bring my collection over next time we hang out.
